section.name: Directory Structure
section.source:
Directory ArtifactId -------------------------------------------------------------------------- . |-- addon hippo-ecm-addon | `-- reviewed-action hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action | |-- common hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-common | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-frontend | |-- repository hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-repository | `-- test hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-test |-- api hippo-ecm-api |-- application hippo-ecm-application | |-- default hippo-ecm-application-default | | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-application-default-frontend | | `-- repository hippo-ecm-application-default-repository | `-- demo hippo-ecm-application-demo | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-application-demo-frontend | `-- repository hippo-ecm-application-demo-repository |-- documentation hippo-ecm-documentation |-- frontend hippo-ecm-frontend | |-- engine hippo-ecm-frontend-engine | |-- application hippo-ecm-frontend-application | `-- plugins hippo-ecm-frontend-plugins |-- repository hippo-ecm-repository | |-- engine hippo-ecm-repository-engine | `-- application hippo-ecm-repository-application `-- tools hippo-ecm-tools |-- migration hippo-ecm-tools-migration `-- testutils hippo-ecm-tools-testutils
==========REPOSITORY======================
|-- repository hippo-ecm-repository | |-- engine hippo-ecm-repository-engine | `-- application hippo-ecm-repository-application
hippo-ecm-repository => Pom project, bundles all repository modules
hippo-ecm-repository-engine => Jar project, core implementation of the repository
hippo-ecm-repository-application => War project, a minimal empty repository application
===========FRONTEND====================
|-- frontend hippo-ecm-frontend | |-- engine hippo-ecm-frontend-engine | |-- application hippo-ecm-frontend-application | `-- plugins hippo-ecm-frontend-plugins
hippo-ecm-frontend => Pom project, bundles all frontend modules
hippo-ecm-frontend-engine => Jar project, core implementation of the frontend
hippo-ecm-frontend-plugins => Jar project, core frontend plugins
hippo-ecm-frontend-application => War project, a minimal frontend application => starts embedded repository => uses hardcoded frontend plugin configuration => portal configuration => wicket configuration
===============Default application===================
|-- application hippo-ecm-application | |-- default hippo-ecm-application-default | | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-application-default-frontend | | `-- repository hippo-ecm-application-default-repository
hippo-ecm-application => Pom project, bundles all application projects
hippo-ecm-application-default => Pom project, bundles the 'default' application projects
hippo-ecm-application-default-frontend => War overlay project, overlays hippo-ecm-frontend-application => adds repository location configuration => adds frontend configuration => adds site-specific configuration (web.xml, log4j.xml etc.)
hippo-ecm-application-default-repository => War overlay project, overlays hippo-ecm-repository-application => adds frontend plugin configuration (bootstrap import of repository export file under /configuration/frontend/) => adds default user configuration (bootstrap import of repository export file under /configuration/users/) => adds any other site-specific configuration (web.xml, log4j.xml etc.)
===============ADDONS===================
|-- addon hippo-ecm-addon | |-- reviewed-action hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action | | |-- common hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-common | | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-frontend | | `-- repository hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-repository
hippo-ecm-addon => Pom project, bundles all addons
hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action => Pom project, bundles the reviewed-action addon
hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-repository => Jar project, contains the repository-only part of the reviewed-action addon
hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-frontend => Jar project, contains the frontend-only part of the reviewed-action addon
hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-common => Jar project, contains the common part of the reviewed-action addon
===============Demo application===================
|-- application hippo-ecm-application | |-- demo hippo-ecm-application-demo | | |-- frontend hippo-ecm-application-demo-frontend | | `-- repository hippo-ecm-application-demo-repository
hippo-ecm-application => Pom project, bundles all application projects
hippo-ecm-application-demo => Pom project, bundles the 'demo' application projects
hippo-ecm-application-demo-frontend => War overlay project, overlays hippo-ecm-application-default-frontend => adds maven dependency on hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-frontend and hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-common
hippo-ecm-application-demo-repository => War overlay project, overlays hippo-ecm-application-default-repository => adds maven dependency on hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-repository and hippo-ecm-addon-reviewed-action-common => adds document model configuration
==============MISC====================
hippo-ecm-api => To be determined
hippo-ecm-documentation => Project documentation
hippo-ecm-tools => Pom project, bundles all tools
hippo-ecm-tools-migration => Jar project, migration from repository 1.X
hippo-ecm-tools-testutils => Jar project, common utilities for testing => history tests + reporting
